text: Timberline may refer to: ==Places== * Timberline Lodge, a National Historic Landmark mountain lodge and ski area in Oregon, U.S. ** Timberline Lodge ski area, the ski area surrounding the lodge ==Products== * Timberline Software, owned by Sage Group since September 2003 ==Schools== * Timberline High School (Boise, Idaho) * Timberline High School (Weippe, Idaho) * Timberline High School (Lacey, Washington) ==See also== * Timberlane (disambiguation) * Tree line
title: Timberline
